org.mini2Dx.ui.element

Class Slider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.UiElement
      • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.Slider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actionable, Hoverable

    public class Slider
extends UiElement
implements Actionable
    A slider UI element that wraps a float value

      • getValueStep

        public float getValueStep()
        Returns the amount to change the value by on each keyboard/controller event
        Returns:
        0.1 by default

      • setValueStep

        public void setValueStep(float valueStep)
        Sets the amount to change the value by on each keyboard/controller event
        Parameters:
        valueStep - A non-zero value

      • isChangedOnBeginEvent

        public boolean isChangedOnBeginEvent()
        Returns if the value should change when a keyboard/controller event begins and change the value until the event ends.
        Returns:
        False by default

      • setChangedOnBeginEvent

        public void setChangedOnBeginEvent(boolean changedOnBeginEvent)
        Sets if the value should change when a keyboard/controller event begins and change the value until the event ends.
        Parameters:
        changedOnBeginEvent - False to only change on the end event
